      • DroneRequest

        public DroneRequest(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Creates a new DroneRequest instance.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - The application Context of the app. You can get this value from activity with ContextWrapper.getApplicationContext() or from fragment you can get the activity and then the context with Fragment.getActivity().

    • Method Detail

      • allDrones

        public void allDrones(int offset)
               throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new all flights request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        offset - Gets the next 20 entries from with the offset as first entry. Starting at 0.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • addDrone

        public void addDrone(String droneModell,
                     int weightInGramm,
                     int flightTimeInMinutes,
                     int diagonalSizeInMM,
                     int maxFlightHeightInM,
                     int maximumSpeedInKmh,
                     android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                     String imageFileName)
              throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new all flights request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        droneModell - The name of the modell of the drone.
        weightInGramm - Thei weight of the drone in gramm.
        flightTimeInMinutes - The maximum flight time in minutes.
        diagonalSizeInMM - The diagonal size of the drone in mm.
        maxFlightHeightInM - The maximum flight height of the drone in m.
        maximumSpeedInKmh - The maximum speed of the drone in kmh.
        image - The image to set as new drone image. Null for no edit
        imageFileName - The name of the image file. Null if image is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • showDrone

        public void showDrone(int droneId)
               throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new all flights request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        droneId - The id of the drone to show.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • editDrone

        public void editDrone(int droneId,
                      String droneModell,
                      int weightInGramm,
                      int flightTimeInMinutes,
                      int diagonalSizeInMM,
                      int maxFlightHeightInM,
                      int maximumSpeedInKmh,
                      android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                      String imageFileName)
               throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new edit flights request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        droneId - The id of the drone to show.
        droneModell - The name of the modell of the drone.
        weightInGramm - Thei weight of the drone in gramm.
        flightTimeInMinutes - The maximum flight time in minutes.
        diagonalSizeInMM - The diagonal size of the drone in mm.
        maxFlightHeightInM - The maximum flight height of the drone in m.
        maximumSpeedInKmh - The maximum speed of the drone in kmh.
        image - The image to set as new drone image. Null for no edit
        imageFileName - The name of the image file. Null if image is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null

      • deleteDrone

        public void deleteDrone(int droneId)
                 throws IllegalStateException
        Sets a new delete flights request to be send over the network.

        Parameters:
        droneId - The id of the drone to delete.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If one of the values is null
